app.title: Eagle WebUI
app.description: A web interface for the Eagle image viewer application

notifications.librarySyncFailedMessage: Could not sync library. Please try again.

language.label: Display language

error.title: Library sync failed.
error.instructions:
Make sure that Eagle and the Eagle WebUI server are both running on the same machine.

Alternatively, start the server with an explicit library path, such as:

libraryImport.LIBRARY_PATH_NOT_FOUND: Unable to locate the Eagle library
libraryImport.METADATA_READ_FAILURE: Unable to read the library metadata
